::Zardus::

Zardus nods. "Yes, we were."

He frowns, leaning forward. "But the Alliance is already on peaceful terms with Darkfate's group. Why would he suddenly send someone simply to check up on that?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Abyssian Badass" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Composer/Orchestra::
> 
> Composer nodded.
> 
> "Well, uh, brother, like my leader said....." Composer said.
> 
> Composer sat down, and Orchestra sat back down.
> 
> "Alright, uh, Zardus, I belive we were discussing about you confirming
> continuing peace with Darkfate's predacons," Orchestra said, trying to get
> over Composer for the sake of the meeting.
> 
> Composer was sitting there, thoughts flooded through his mind.  He would try
> and get ORchestra to join the Alliance.......This whole reunion then made
> him think of the youngest brother.....Symphony.
